homeBanner.slideTagline: This is how New Zealand introduces itself.

entries.homeIntroText: We believe in design working for better. For the positive difference it can make.
entries.homeSubText: We are Designworks. Bringing together all aspects of design to make positive change. Working for our country, with our communities and alongside our companies. Defining difference, telling our stories and creating experiences that mean something to people.

description.content: This is how New Zealand introduces itself.
A new energy in a new kind of hotel.
